data.decision: Start MSJ (My Swim Journey) project with data model first, then UI
data.rationale: User has real data (Ariana's Snowpen meet) to inform requirements. Starting with data model ensures we capture all entities: swimmers, meets, events, race logs, body state, parent observations, equipment. Both swimmer and parent are users.
data.context: New project for tracking swimmer performance, progression, food, mood. Based on actual meet documents from Ariana (11yo, City of Manchester Aquatics).
